A man has been charged with attempted murder after a knife attack at Leytonstone Tube station in London on Saturday, the Met Police has said.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
Muhaydin Mire, who is 29 and of Sansom Road, east London, will appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court later.
A 56-year-old man was left with "serious" stab wounds and another person was injured during the attack at around 19:00 GMT.
A man was arrested after being Tasered by police officers.
On Sunday, the Met appealed to anyone with photos or video of the attack at the Central Line station to contact them.
Summary:
